coinText: The uk penny which is one pence, weighs 3.56g. It was made of bronze till 1992 when it was switched to copper plated steel
The uk two pence weighs 7.12g. It was made of bronze till 1992 when it was switched to copper plated steel
The uk shilling which is five pence weighs 3.25g. It is made of steel and plated with nickel
The danish 50øre weighs 4.3g. It is made mainly with bronze with less than 1% of it been made of tin.
The aluminum cent was a one-cent coin proposed by the United States Mint in 1973. It was composed of 96% aluminum and other trace metals
The east african one cent was approved for production in 1906 and in circulation till 1908. The composition of the coin is primarily aluminum.
the 1/10 of a penny was first issued in 1907. It was made of aluminium and was probably the world's first aluminium circulation coin. It was in commission till 1908.
